snippet.title: Sippy Disco Release Trailer
snippet.description:
It's time to boogie! Sippy Disco is out this Friday 2/28/24 on Steam!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2766470/Sippy_Disco_Light_Up_the_Dance_Floor/

Light up the dance floor in this cozy puzzle game! Sippy the unicorn must step on every square in the fewest possible moves to make the dance floor light up. Partner with Parrots on skates and disco balls to brighten everyone’s day!
